api_output.description: xml, json, or serialize (default is XML)

filters.description: Campaigns sent by users of a certain group.

full.description: Whether or not to return ALL data, or an abbreviated portion (set to 1 for ALL data, and 0 for abbreviated).

ids.description: A comma-separated list of campaign ID's you wish to view.

page.description: Pagination: results are limited to 10 per page, so specify what page to view.

sort.description: Field to sort on (possible values: id, cdate).

sort_direction.description: Direction of sort (possible values: ASC or DESC).
